long_description: The pocket-sized JVC ADIXXION Cam 2 action camera has built-in Wi-Fi, a 1.5-in. LCD monitor and a rugged design that shrugs water, dust and freezing temps without the need for a separate housing. The ADIXXION lets you record all the action in 1080/60p full HD; gyro-sensor image stabilizer reduces shake; and super-wide lens expands your viewing angle. 8 mega-pixel back-illuminated CMOS captures a high resolution image and combined with the F2.4 lens, gives excellent low-light performance. Dual standard tripod mounts allow use of a wide range of accessories (sold separately). Built-in 1.5-in. LCD monitor features 112,000-pixel resolution, auto brightness and auto off. Wi-Fi and Quad View create a fast wireless connection that syncs to iOS and Android smartphones for remote control and video monitoring of up to four ADIXXION cameras at once. 5X digital zoom; 16-megapixel ultra-resolution stills; high-speed burst photos; simultaneous recording of video and stills; time-lapse stills; 720/120p high-speed recording. Gyro Sensor digital image stabilizer helps take the shake out of your video; integrated mic with 128 kbps audio ensures clear, high-quality sound. Connections include mini HDMI output, USB for computer connections and battery charging and SD/SDHC/SDXC card slot. Enjoy easy operation with on-board video effects, on-screen menu system, auto and manual white balance and simple USB battery charging. Works with iMovie and Final Cut Pro X for easy video editing, sharing and archiving; USTREAM video streaming allows you to easily upload video to Youtube and other video sites. The JVC ADIXXION Cam 2 action camera is waterproof to 5m, shockproof for drops from 2m, dustproof and freezeproof; battery provides up to 2 hrs. 5 min. record time.
